column1: Total nonfarm payroll jobs
Minnesota, 1950-2016
Total jobs
Percent change in jobs from previous year
Notes:
Jobs are averaged over the year.
The Current Employment Statistics (CES) is a monthly survey of nonfarm
businesses for estimating industry employment. The self-employed as well as
agriculture, domestic, military workers are excluded. Employment is defined
as a count of jobs by place of work rather than a count of employed
persons.
The CES program is a federal-state cooperative program between the U.S.
Bureau of Labor Statistics and state agencies. The largest program of its
kind,the CES is based on a survey of approximately 143,000 businesses and
government agencies representing approximately 588,000 worksites throughout
the United States.
Sources:
U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, Current Employment Statistics.
http://www.bls.gov/data/
Data downloaded from http://www.mncompass.org on 04/09/2018
